# clickhouse_database (Resource)

Clickhouse database



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Clickhouse database name

### Optional

- `cluster_name` (String) Clickhouse cluster to execute DDL

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
